headline: Ask HN: Nested Resources in REST/HTTP API URLs?
description:
If you're building a REST/HTTP API, how do you think about when to express the hierarchy of resources in the URLs?

For example, let's say you had a blog site. Organizations have blogs. Blogs are made up of sections and comment threads. Comment threads have individual comments.

Would you opt for:

- /organizations/:organizationId/blogs/:blogId OR /blogs/:blogId (and get the organization from somewhere else like an auth token)

- /organizations/:organizationId/blogs/:blogId/sections/:sectionId OR /blogs/:blogId/sections/:sectionId OR /sections/:sectionId

- /organizations/:organizationId/blogs/:blogId/threads/:threadId/comments/:commentId... you get the idea
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: REST/HTTP API URLs中的嵌套资源？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: REST/HTTP API URLs中的嵌套資源？
description_zh-Hans:
如果你正在构建一个REST/HTTP API，你如何考虑何时在URL中表达资源的层次结构？

例如，假设你有一个博客网站。各个组织都有博客。博客是由章节和评论线程组成的。评论线程有个人评论。

你会选择：

- /organizations/:organizationId/blogs/:blogId或者/blogs/:blogId（并从其他地方获得组织，如auth token）

- /organizations/: organizationId/blogs/:blogId/sections/:sectionId OR /blogs/:blogId/sections/:sectionId OR /sections/:sectionId

- /organizations/:organizationId/blogs/:blogId/threads/:threadId/comments/:commentId。 ...你会明白的
description_zh-Hant:
如果你正在構建一個REST/HTTP API，你如何考慮何時在URL中表達資源的層次結構？

例如，假設你有一個博客網站。各個組織都有博客。博客是由章節和評論線程組成的。評論線程有個人評論。

你會選擇：

- /organizations/:organizationId/blogs/:blogId或者/blogs/:blogId（並從其他地方獲得組織，如auth token）

- /organizations/: organizationId/blogs/:blogId/sections/:sectionId OR /blogs/:blogId/sections/:sectionId OR /sections/:sectionId

- /organizations/:organizationId/blogs/:blogId/threads/:threadId/comments/:commentId。 ...你會明白的
